title: 'Not worth the price'
body: Spray doesn't work well. Trigger gets loose and stops spraying frequently. Not worth the price.

body: There's is a 12 month warranty - how do I activate this? This is my second mop (bought my first a couple of years ago and it's been perfect, bought the second for upstairs) and it was great until a piece of the handle attachment right by the bottle chipped and so the handle no longer will stay connected.  Sorry to give a low star rating my first mop has been, and still is, great. Hope to hear from you at which time I'll up date the review.

body: I liked the mop while it lasted. Easy to use, lightweight, easy to clean the mop head. I believe it should have lasted more than 18 months. I don't use it every day or for very long. The plastic part in the handle that operates the trigger to release the liquid broke. Cannot repair.

body: When it was fresh out of the box, the nozzle for spray worked very well. After a few months use, spray nozzle for fluid stopped working! I made sure the nozzle was clear from blockage. When I press the handle, there's not resistance and no spray. I had this exact model from same vendor which I used for several years! This is my second mop, it wasn't as good as first one.

title: 'N/A'
body: 'I purchased this and really liked how light and easy it was to use. The mop pads are great and stick will. However after just a few months the spray nozzle stopped working. Now it’s just a glorified mop.'

body: 'I put some solution in this cleaned my floors and then set it aside. Came back to find all the solution (which is an expensive solution we buy for our hardwood floors) had ALL leaked out onto the floor. Unbelievable. This thing is crap.'

body: I love bona and this makes it easier to use. The padsar absorbent and wash great. I can't believe how this brought out the detail in my floor. I didn't give it a 5 for deep cleaning because I don't have cracks that indent so I don't know.

body: 'Have been looking for something like this. No more buying special liquid cleaner and disposable cloths. I absolutely love it. You can put whatever cleaner in it and just throw the mop cloths in the washer.'

body: 'The spray bottle is hard to extract. Spray stopped after few uses. Very disappointed'

title: 'N/A'
body: 'It worked well the first few months and I loved how you could hang it for easy storage but here we are 8 months out and it comes apart. I reattach it hoping I would still be able to clean my floors; however it would not spray the cleaning solution. I took the solution bottle out to see if I perhaps placed it in the slot incorrectly and noticed some broken plastic pieces. So I do not recommend this product it broke in less than a year.'

body: 'I ordered this mop as it had good reviews. Upon arrival this mop was all i had hoped for till the squirt mechanism broke after a month.
